metadata.description: A collection of expert-level Claude Code skills for automation, AI agents, workflow engineering, and more.

plugins.name: n8n-workflow-engineer
plugins.description:
Expert-level skill for designing, implementing, validating, and maintaining production-ready n8n automation workflows using
  comprehensive MCP tooling. Handles everything from simple webhook-to-API flows to complex multi-agent AI systems.

plugins.name: senior-agno-developer
plugins.description: A comprehensive skill for building production-ready AI agents and agentic systems using the Agno framework.
